Guitar Promo
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2004 Topics (Year of the Venture): Guitar Promo
By CHB on Saturday, December 11, 2004 - 12:23 am:

Just wasting space I guess, but this is pretty cool.

I spoke to a man in Korea (Where he lives) that makes guitars. I heard about him from a Captain in my flight that had purchased a couple of these custom guitars. It was pretty nice.

Well, the guy said he could actually make me a 4-string Bass that looks like a Durahan (Or a Knight, your pick)

Basically, the body is the Durahan with one arm crossed in front of him, while the other arm is outstretching his blade, which ends up being the neck of the guitar. For the head, we discussed various choices (severed head included) but decided that a golden star at the tip of the sword was more appropriate, representing a gleam.

I'm going to experiment with colors, but leaning towards a black armored one (Think Kade from my Epic Still In Progress).

Either way, not going to make it too cartoony, but if someone asks I can at least name the inspiration. I already have two basses; one is a regular Yamaha starter, while the other is an $800 beauty of a BC Rich NG series 4-string Warlock with a red swirled into black paint scheme and a spider head (or widow, whatever you want to call it).

If I end up purchasing another guitar (I really should stop), then I'll try and get some digital photos up, or if I get a band together next year, I can post some pics of me playing it on stage.

So, we'll just have to see.

Rock Out.

By CHB on Saturday, December 11, 2004 - 12:24 am:

Oh, his call sign is "Mr. Potato" if anyone is interested. He stamps that logo on all his guitars.

Though he has considered changing it. :D
